Text: What about subs? There hasn't been a Nordic utload for this title.
The torrent DOES work, except that the seeder is missing right now.
It is an English-Chinese version which is OK if you don't need the Nordic subtitles.
There *is* a defect in the recording; it skips most of the first wedding ceremony after Charlie discovers he's forgotten the rings. Otherwise a good copy. Perhaps it could be redone?
